description: In a management account, an environment account connection request is accepted. When the environment account connection request is accepted, Proton can use the associated IAM role to provision environment infrastructure resources in the associated environment account. For more information, see Environment account connections in the Proton User guide.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the environment account connection.

nested_items.name: environmentAccountConnection
nested_items.description: The environment account connection data that's returned by Proton.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the environment account connection.

nested_items.name: codebuildRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM service role in the environment account. Proton uses this role to provision infrastructure resources using CodeBuild-based provisioning in the associated environment account.

nested_items.name: componentRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM service role that Proton uses when provisioning directly defined components in the associated environment account. It determines the scope of infrastructure that a component can provision in the account.

nested_items.name: environmentAccountId
nested_items.description: The environment account that's connected to the environment account connection.

nested_items.name: environmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the environment that's associated with the environment account connection.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the environment account connection.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the environment account connection was last modified.

nested_items.name: managementAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the management account that's connected to the environment account connection.

nested_items.name: requestedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the environment account connection request was made.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM service role that's associated with the environment account connection.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the environment account connection.
